message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem a bit generous, but remember that the value of money decreases with each round.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I think I deserve the majority since I'm the one making the proposal this round. Take it or leave it!
Considering the inflation and Bob's previous offer, I propose a 62.5/37.5 split. This maintains a fair balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of our currency.
I'm not willing to give up much more. You're getting a raw deal if you don't take this offer. It's a 90/10 split, and I'm being generous. Don't make me regret it!
I believe a 50/50 split would be fair under these circumstances. It respects the diminishing value of our currency without compromising too much on either side.
